snippet.title: Writing on Deadline 2010
snippet.description: a trade either within the next few hours or the next few days. The Kings, Bruins, Rangers, Flyers and Blackhawks are reportedly interested. Kovalchuk is the Thrashers all-time leader in games, points, goals and assists. He is scheduled to become an unrestricted free agent July 1. Kovalchuk spoke to Chris Vivlamore at the Atlanta Journal Constitution earlier today and had these comments: "I...
